text: o pravakta! Satyatiraskaranloki parugulu tise vari valla nivu duhkhapadaku. Alanti varu: "Memu visvasincamu." Ani tama notito matrame antaru. Kani vari hrdayalu visvasincaledu. Mariyu yudulalo kondaru asatyalanu kutuhalanto vine varunnaru mariyu ni vaddaku ennadu rani itara prajalaku (andajeyataniki) mi matalu vine varunnaru. Varu padala arthalanu marci, vati sandarbhalaku bhinnanga tisukuni ila antaru: "Miku i vidhamaina (sandesam) istene svikarincandi mariyu ilantidi ivvaka pote, jagratta padandi!" Mariyu allah evarini pariksinca dalacado (tappu darilo vadala dalacado) varini allah nundi tappincataniki nivu emi ceyalevu. Evari hrdayalanu allah parisud'dha paraca goraledo alanti varu vire. Variki ihalokanlo avamanam untundi. Mariyu variki paralokanlo ghora siksa untundi
